title: After firing 14,000 employees, Amazon tells remaining staff to lean in on AI
description: Amazon has reportedly laid off employees from its OS & Services group as part of its larger plan to trim around 14,000 corporate roles across departments. What followed was a clear message to the remaining workforce: adapt quickly and embrace artificial intelligence.
content: Amazon is once again tightening its workforce, this time focusing on its devices division — the team responsible for consumer hardware such as Kindle e-readers, Fire tablets, and Echo smart speakers. The company has reportedly laid off employees from... [2787 chars]

title: Analysis-Tech spending plans will test stock market's AI trade
description: NEW YORK (Reuters) -Spending updates this week from U.S. megacap companies that are investing massively in artificial intelligence could jolt the AI trade that has been a primary driver of the record-breaking U.S. stocks rally.
content:

title: TE Connectivity forecasts upbeat quarterly profit on strong demand for AI products
description: TE Connectivity issued an upbeat first-quarter forecast on Wednesday, after beating Wall Street estimates for profit for the preceding three months, aided by strong demand for its artificial intelligence-focused products.
content:
Shares of the company rose 9% in premarket trading.

title: Apple poised for iPhone sales boost on strong Pro demand
description: Apple's quarterly results on Thursday are expected to show the company can spark a strong iPhone upgrade cycle even without the flashy artificial intelligence tools it has been slow to release, a delay that has dulled its appeal on Wall Street.
content:
The consumer tech giant's new iPhone 17 lineup that launched on September 19 has drawn strong early demand in crucial markets, including the U.S. and China, as a sharper display, larger storage options and an upgraded processor attract buyers.

title: Nvidia on Brink of Historic $5 Trillion Valuation Amid AI Boom
description: Nvidia is poised to reach a $5 trillion market value, surpassing giants like Apple and Microsoft, as it leads the artificial intelligence surge. The company's success positions it as a tech giant and geopolitical player, navigating challenges with U.S. and China. Analysts express concern over valuation optimism.
content: Nvidia is on the verge of a monumental milestone, with market value potentially exceeding $5 trillion as it dominates the artificial intelligence industry. In response to increasing demand, CEO Jensen Huang announced plans for massive AI chip orders ... [487 chars]

title: AI Spending Is What Matters Most in Alphabet, Microsoft Earnings
description: Artificial intelligence is so essential to the three-year bull market in US stocks that updates on spending and progress developing the technology are what investors most want to see when the world’s biggest tech companies report earnings.
